content: Which infamous pirate, known as the terror of the seas, shares his name with a brand of spiced rum?

But is there a spiced rum brand named after him? I believe there is a rum called "Blackbeard's Spiced Rum." It's possible that's the one you're thinking of. Moreover, Captain Morgan was actually knighted and became the Lieutenant Governor of Jamaica, so his legacy is a bit more complex than just being a pirate. But certainly, his pirate activities are what make him infamous.
